00125    /*
00126    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00127    */
00128    template <class Archive>
00129    void RDF::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00130    {
00131       if (!isInitialized_) {
00132          UTIL_THROW("Error: object not initialized");
00133       }
00134 
00135       // Members that are not set by readParam
00136       ar & accumulator_;
00137       ar & typeNumbers_;
00138       ar & normSum_;
00139 
00140       serializeCheck(ar, nAtomType_, "nAtomType");
00141    }
